description: I worked at Futurice for the summer of 2023 as a Full Stack Developer. I got to work on a large project that was already several years in the making. My tasks ranged from managing SSL certificates to implementing new frontend features to updating virtual machines with Terraform.

I got real hands-on experience with all aspects of software development at Kuormat.com start-up. I worked as part of a three-person team so we all had big responsibilities. In addition to writing the application, I worked a lot on developing our own agile ways of working.

I have worked as a teaching and research assistant on multiple courses at the University of Helsinki. My role has varied a lot on the courses: in addition to working as an assistant on a few project courses, for a year I ran the daily operations of some of the largest courses of the university, Introduction to Programming and Advanced Programming.

During my previous career I worked as a Head Chef at this award-winning resort in Puumala. There I got great experience from building and leading a team, doing a lot of creative thinking, and working under pressure.
